Oh man... I'd be all over this, if only my dsl came back to life 
(still waiting 8 more days though)... Still have dial-up... If anyone 
can download this maybe we can put it up on an ftp server? Oh and if 
we have larger files that can't be stored in yahoo anymore we can 
also do that. I'm willing to setup an ftp server and keep my PC up 
most of the time when I get my dsl back up again, although my upload 
speed to you will only be 20kb because eventhough they say I have 
much more in reality I only get that. (Don't ask me why... Phones 
companies.. -_-) I would put up an http server but I never learned 
how to... Maybe in two months or so I'd learn how but no time right 
now to set up http... Let me know what you guys think.
